notes: A biological community of interacting organisms and their physical environment.
The variety of plant and animal life in a particular habitat.
The natural home or environment of an animal plant or other organism.
A species at serious risk of extinction.
The protection and preservation of natural resources.
The clearing of forests on a large scale.
Long-term shifts in global temperatures and weather patterns.
Energy from sources that are naturally replenishing.
The presence of harmful substances in the environment.
Able to be maintained at a certain rate or level without depleting resources.
